snippet: The author of "Fatal Vision," Joe McGinniss, has issued an e-book, "Final Vision," that responds to a new round of criticism. He has long been a target for arguing that Dr. MacDonald was rightfully convicted for murdering his wife and daughters.
abstract: The author of "Fatal Vision," Joe McGinniss, has issued an e-book, "Final Vision," that responds to a new round of criticism. He has long been a target for arguing that Dr. MacDonald was rightfully convicted for murdering his wife and daughters.

headline.main: For a New Generation, a New Literary Battle Over Jeffrey MacDonald's Guilt
headline.print_headline: McGinniss Versus His Critics: Another Round
